com.fdmgroup.piggybank

Class ConverterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fdmgroup.piggybank.ConverterController

  • public class ConverterController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the conversion logic for a currency to Euro, or from Euro to a currency.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Khoi Phan

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal convert()
      This method takes the currency and amount, that the user is comparing to Euros, and converts it to Euros, or from Euros to the user selected currency and amount.

      This method gets the conversion rate, for the current Currency the user is comparing to Euros.

      • convert

        public java.math.BigDecimal convert()
        This method takes the currency and amount, that the user is comparing to Euros, and converts it to Euros, or from Euros to the user selected currency and amount.
        Returns:
        BigDecimal This returns the converted currency amount.
        See Also:
        BigDecimal.multiply(BigDecimal)

      • getConversionRate

        public java.math.BigDecimal getConversionRate()
        This method gets the conversion rate, for the current Currency the user is comparing to Euros. HashMap.get(Object), java.math.BigDecimal#divide(BigDecimal, int, RoundingMode)
        Returns:
        BigDecimal This returns the conversion rate for Euro to a Currency, or the Currency to Euro conversion rate.
